name: Asiago Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel made with chunks of asiago cheese baked inside and topped with more asiago.

name: Blueberry Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel made with a mix of dried infused blueberries and blueberry flavors baked inside.

name: Chocolate Chip Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel made with milk chocolate chips.

name: Cinnamon Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel made with cinnamon and vanilla flavored chips and topped with our sweet cinnamon crunch topping.

name: Everything Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel topped with sesame seeds, poppy seeds, dried garlic, toasted onion & kosher salt.

name: Plain Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel lightly sweetened with brown sugar.

name: Sesame Bagel
description: Freshly baked bagel topped with nutty sesame seeds.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Freshly baked muffin with blueberries and topped with streusel.

name: Cranberry Orange Muffin
description: Freshly baked muffin made with orange peel and whole cranberries, topped with turbinado sugar.

name: Pumpkin Muffin
description: Made with real pumpkin and topped with streusel and powdered sugar.

name: Dark Roast Coffee
description: Rich and bold full body with dark chocolate notes and a nutty, sweet finish. Brewed from beans harvested from volcanic soils in Colombia. Freshly ground in cafes.

name: Light Roast Coffee
description: Soft and smooth with hints of citrus, roasted nut and chocolate. A blend of Central and South American beans. Light bodied with a bright sweetness. Freshly ground in cafes.

name: Green Passion Smoothie
description: Peach and mango purees and white grape and passionfruit juices blended with fresh spinach and ice.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Mango fruit base mixed with orange juice and banana puree blended with plain Greek yogurt and ice.

name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
description: Fresh strawberries blended with a banana and plain Greek yogurt and ice.

name: Caramel Latte
description: Espresso, foamed milk & caramel, topped with whipped cream & a drizzle of caramel sauce.

name: Chocolate Latte
description: Freshly brewed espresso, foamed milk and chocolate topped with whipped cream and a drizzle of chocolate syrup.

name: Egg and Sausage Breakfast Sandwich
description: Sausage, over-easy egg, American cheese, salt and pepper, and garlic aioli on a freshly baked Asiago bagel.

name: Scrambled Egg and Sausage Breakfast Sandwich
description: Sausage, scrambled egg, American cheese, salt and pepper, and garlic aioli on a freshly baked Asiago bagel.

name: Plain Cream Cheese
description: Plain Cream Cheese Spread - Individual 1.75oz

name: Chive and Onion Cream Cheese
description: Reduced Fat Chive and Onion Cream Cheese Spread – Individual 1.75oz

name: Honey Walnut Cream Cheese
description: Reduced Fat Honey Walnut Cream Cheese Spread – Individual 1.75oz
